translations.mpeg2video.advanced.mpeg_quant._descript: Utiliza los cuantificadores de MPEG en vez de los del formato H.263
translations.libsvtav1.standard.crf._description: Un valor inferior producirá una mejor calidad, pero aumentará el tiempo de procesamiento.
translations.libsvtav1.standard.bitrate._description: La tasa de datos que permitirá el codificador.
translations.libsvtav1.standard.maxrate._description: Un valor más alto podrá mejorar la calidad máxima, pero aumentará los requisitos de decodificación.
translations.libsvtav1.standard.profile._description: El perfil de flujo de bits que se utilizará
translations.libsvtav1.standard.tune._description: Specifies whether to use PSNR or VQ as the tuning metric
translations.libsvtav1.standard.tier._description: Establece la categoría («tier») del punto de funcionamiento.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.fast-decode._descript: Tune settings to output bitstreams that can be decoded faster.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.irefresh-type._descri: Intra refresh type [FWD Frame (Open GOP), KEY Frame (Closed GOP)]
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.enable-hdr._descripti: Permite escribir los metadatos del alto rango dinámico (HDR) en el flujo de bits.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.asm._description: Limit assembly instruction set [c, mmx, sse, sse2, sse3, ssse3, sse4_1, sse4_2, avx, avx2, avx512, max]
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.lp._description: Target (best effort) number of logical cores to be used. 0 means all.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.pin._description: Pin the execution to the first --lp cores. Overwritten to 0 when --ss is set.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.ss._description: Specifies which socket to run on, assumes a max of two sockets.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.lookahead._descriptio: El número de fotogramas futuros a usar en la anticipación adaptativa («lookahead»), más allá de «minigop», el filtrado temporal y el control de tasas [-1: automático].
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.force-key-frames._des: Force key frames at the comma separated specifiers. #f for frames, #.#s for seconds.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.aq-mode._description: Establece el nivel del cuantificador constante (QP) adaptativo.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.use-fixed-qindex-offs: Overwrite the encoder default hierarchical layer based QP assignment and use fixed Q index offsets.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.key-frame-qindex-offs: Overwrite the encoder default keyframe Q index assignment.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.key-frame-chroma-qind: Overwrite the encoder default chroma keyframe Q index assignment.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.undershoot-pct._descr: Allowable datarate undershoot (min) target (%), default depends on the rate control mode.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.overshoot-pct._descri: Allowable datarate overshoot (max) target (%), default depends on the rate control mode.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.mbr-overshoot-pct._de: Allowable datarate overshoot (max) target (%), Only applicable for Capped CRF.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.buf-sz._description: Client maximum buffer size (ms), only applicable for CBR.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.buf-initial-sz._descr: Client initial buffer size (ms), only applicable for CBR.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.buf-optimal-sz._descr: Client optimal buffer size (ms), only applicable for CBR.
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.recode-loop._item_1: Allow recode for KF and exceeding maximum frame bandwidth
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.recode-loop._item_2: Allow recode only for key frames, alternate reference frames, and Golden frames
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.recode-loop._item_3: Allow recode for all frame types based on bitrate constraints
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.minsection-pct._label: Tasa de bits mín. del GOP
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.minsection-pct._descr: GOP min bitrate (expressed as a percentage of the target rate).
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.maxsection-pct._label: Tasa de bits máx. del GOP
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.maxsection-pct._descr: GOP max bitrate (expressed as a percentage of the target rate).
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.gop-constraint-rc._la: Control de tasa de restricción de los GOP
translations.libsvtav1.advanced.gop-constraint-rc._de: Restringe el control de la tasa para que coincida con la tasa de destino de cada GOP.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.tile-rows._descri: Number of tile rows to use, TileRow == log2(x), default changes per resolution.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.tile-columns._des: Number of tile columns to use, TileCol == log2(x), default changes per resolution.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.enable-tpl-la._de: Temporal Dependency model control, currently forced on library side, only applicable for CRF/CQP.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.enable-overlays._: Enable the insertion of overlayer pictures which will be used as an additional reference frame for the base layer picture.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.rmv._description: Restrict motion vectors from reaching outside the picture boundary.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.film-grain-denois: Apply denoising when film grain is ON, default is 1 [0: no denoising, film grain data sent in frame header, 1: level of denoising is set by the film-grain parameter].
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.superres-denom._d: Super-resolution denominator, only applicable for mode == 1 [8: no scaling, 16: half-scaling].
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.superres-kf-denom: Super-resolution denominator for key frames, only applicable for mode == 1 [8: no scaling, 16: half-scaling].
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.superres-qthres._: Super-resolution q-threshold, only applicable for mode == 3.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.superres-kf-qthre: Super-resolution q-threshold for key frames, only applicable for mode == 3.
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.sframe-mode._desc: S-Frame insertion mode [1: the considered frame will be made into an S-Frame only if it is an altref frame, 2: the next altref frame will be made into an S-Frame].
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.resize-denom._des: Reference scaling denominator, only applicable for mode == 1 [8: no scaling, 16: half-scaling].
translations.libsvtav1.av1_specific.resize-kf-denom._: Reference scaling denominator for key frames
Reference scaling denominator for key frames, only applicable for mode == 1 [8: no scaling, 16: half-scaling].
translations.libsvtav1.color.mastering-display._descr: Mastering display metadata in the format of G(x,y)B(x,y)R(x,y)WP(x,y)L(max,min)
translations.libsvtav1.color.content-light._descripti: Define el nivel de luz del contenido siguiendo el formato «max_cll,max_fall»
translations.libsvt_hevc.standard.bitrate._descriptio: La tasa de datos que permitirá el codificador.
translations.libsvt_hevc.standard.preset._description: Encoding preset (Lower values result in higher quality and encoding time.
translations.libsvt_hevc.advanced.bl_mode._descriptio: Random Access Prediction Structure type setting
translations.libsvt_hevc.advanced.forced-idr._descrip: If forcing keyframes, force them as IDR frames.
translations.libsvt_hevc.advanced.asm_type._descripti: Assembly instruction set type [false: C Only, true: Auto]
translations.png.advanced.dpi._description: Set image resolution (in dots per inch) (from 0 to 65536) (default 0)
translations.png.advanced.dpm._description: Set image resolution (in dots per meter) (from 0 to 65536) (default 0)
translations.tiff.advanced.dpi._description: Establece la resolución de la imagen (en puntos por pulgada) (de 0 a 65536) (valor predeterminado: 0)
translations.av1_qsv.standard.bitrate._description: La tasa de datos que permitirá el codificador.
translations.av1_qsv.standard.maxrate._description: Un valor más alto podrá mejorar la calidad máxima, pero aumentará los requisitos de decodificación.
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.g._description: Maximum Group of Pictures Structure size in which intra- and inter-frames are arranged. Smaller values increase the video quality.
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.max_frame_size._descrip: Maximum encoded frame size in bytes
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.max_slice_size._descrip: El tamaño máximo de un segmento codificado (en bytes)
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.bitrate_limit._descript: Activa o desactiva los límites en la tasa de bits
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.b_strategy._description: La estrategia para elegir entre I/P/B-Frames
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.forced_idr._description: Forcing I frames as IDR frames
translations.av1_qsv.advanced.low_power._description: enable low power mode(experimental: many limitations by mfx version, BRC modes, etc.)
translations.av1_nvenc.hardware.computecapability._de: The version of the Compute Capability features.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.preset._description: El tiempo de procesamiento de cada fotograma. Un valor más bajo aumentará la calidad general del vídeo, pero llevará más tiempo procesarlo.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.tune._description: Establece la información del ajuste de codificación
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy._description: El modo de codificación a utilizar. Seleccione Tasa de bits constante (CBR), Cuantificador constante (CQP) o Tasa de bits variable (VBR) y si se deben utilizar dos pasadas de codificación (solo para VBR).
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.cqp._descrip: El nivel de calidad del vídeo. Un valor más bajo producirá una mejor calidad, pero aumentará el tamaño de los archivos y el tiempo de procesamiento.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.bitrate._des: La tasa de datos que permitirá el codificador.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.buffersize._: El tamaño del búfer del flujo de bits del codificador.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.maxrate._des: Un valor más alto podrá mejorar la calidad máxima, pero aumentará los requisitos de decodificación.
translations.av1_nvenc.standard.strategy.cq._descript: Establece el nivel de calidad de destino (0 a 51, 0 equivale a automático).
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.rclookahead._descriptio: Establece el número de fotogramas a utilizar para el control de velocidad y la anticipación adaptativa («lookahead»). Un valor más alto producirá una mejor calidad y aumentará la precisión.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.strictgop._description: Minimiza las fluctuaciones de la tasa entre GOP y GOP.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.noscenecut._description: Al activar la anticipación adaptativa («lookahead»), seleccione 1 para desactivar la inserción de I-Frames adaptativos en cambios de plano.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.forcedidr._description: Al forzar fotogramas clave, estos se codificarán como fotogramas IDR.
translations.av1_nvenc.frames.nonrefp._description: Permite la inserción automática de P-Frames que no sean referencias.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qpi._description: Active esta opción para cambiar el parámetro de cuantificación de los intrafotogramas (I-Frames).
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qpp._description: Active esta opción para cambiar el parámetro de cuantificación de los fotogramas predichos (P-Frames).
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qpb._description: Active esta opción para cambiar el parámetro de cuantificación de los fotogramas predichos bidireccionalmente (B-Frames).
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qp_cb_offset._descri: Quantization parameter offset for cb channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.qp_cr_offset._descri: Quantization parameter offset for cr channel (from -12 to 12) (default 0)
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.spatialaq._descripti: Selecciona dentro del modo de cuantificación adaptativa (AQ) la cantidad de bits a distribuir entre todos los macrobloques del vídeo.
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.spatialaq.strength._: Escala de intensidad de la AQ de 1 (baja) a 15 (agresiva).
translations.av1_nvenc.quantizer.temporalaq._descript: Selecciona dentro del modo de cuantificación adaptativa (AQ) la cantidad de bits a distribuir entre todos los macrobloques del vídeo.
translations.av1_nvenc.misc.level._description: Limita los parámetros de codificación, como el rango de la tasa de bits y el tamaño máximo de los cuadros.
translations.av1_nvenc.misc.surfaces._description: El número de bloques de memoria asignados para el procesamiento de mapas de bits.
translations.av1_nvenc.misc.zerolat._description: Indica operaciones a latencia cero (sin retraso de reordenación).
translations.filter.atrim.standard.start._description: Marca de tiempo del primer fotograma a enviar
translations.filter.atrim.standard.end._description: Marca de tiempo del primer fotograma que debería ser ignorado de nuevo
translations.filter.atrim.standard.start_sample._desc: El número de la primera muestra de audio que debería enviarse a la salida
translations.filter.atrim.standard.end_sample._descri: El número de la primera muestra de audio que debería ser ignorada de nuevo
translations.filter.bwdif.standard.parity._descriptio: Specify the assumed picture field parity
translations.filter.colorspace.advanced.fast._descrip: Do a fast conversion, which skips gamma/primary correction. This will take significantly less CPU, but will be mathematically incorrect. To get output compatible with that produced by the colormatrix filter, use fast=1.
translations.filter.crop.standard.out_w._description: Establece el ancho de la zona a recortar
translations.filter.crop.standard.out_h._description: Establece la altura de la zona a recortar
translations.filter.crop.advanced.x._description: Establece el desplazamiento en el eje X de la zona a recortar
translations.filter.crop.advanced.y._description: Establece el desplazamiento en el eje Y de la zona a recortar
translations.filter.decimate.standard.cycle._descript: Set the number of frame from which one will be dropped
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.blockx._descrip: Set the size of the x-axis blocks used during metric calculations
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.blocky._descrip: Set the size of the y-axis blocks used during metric calculations
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.ppsrc._descript: Mark main input as a pre-processed input and activate clean source input stream
translations.filter.decimate.advanced.chroma._descrip: Set whether or not chroma is considered in the metric calculations
translations.filter.eq.standard.contrast._description: Set the contrast expression. The value must be a float value in range -1000.0 to 1000.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.brightness._descripti: Set the brightness expression. The value must be a float value in range -1.0 to 1.0. The default value is 0.
translations.filter.eq.standard.saturation._descripti: Set the saturation expression. The value must be a float in range 0.0 to 3.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma._description: Set the gamma expression. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_r._description: Set the gamma expression for red. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_g._description: Set the gamma expression for green. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_b._description: Set the gamma expression for blue. The value must be a float in range 0.1 to 10.0. The default value is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.gamma_weight._descrip: Set the gamma weight expression. It can be used to reduce the effect of a high gamma value on bright image areas, e.g. keep them from getting overamplified and just plain white. The value must be a float in range 0.0 to 1.0. A value of 0.0 turns the gamma correction all the way down while 1.0 leaves it at its full strength. Default is 1.
translations.filter.eq.standard.eval._description:
Set when the expressions for brightness, contrast, saturation and gamma expressions are evaluated. It accepts the following values:

Init - only evaluate expressions once during the filter initialization or when a command is processed

Frame - evaluate expressions for each incoming frame

Default value is Init.
translations.filter.fps.standard.fps._description: El nuevo número de fotogramas por segundo (FPS).
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.luma_spatial._des: A non-negative floating point number which specifies spatial luma strength. It defaults to 4.0.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.chroma_spatial._d: A non-negative floating point number which specifies spatial chroma strength. It defaults to 3.0*luma_spatial/4.0.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.luma_tmp._descrip: A floating point number which specifies luma temporal strength. It defaults to 6.0*luma_spatial/4.0.
translations.filter.hqdn3d.standard.chroma_tmp._descr: A floating point number which specifies chroma temporal strength. It defaults to luma_tmp*chroma_spatial/luma_spatial.
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._descript: Set mode for the first plane.
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_1: 1 - Clips the pixel with the minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_2: 2 - Clips the pixel with the second minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_3: 3 - Clips the pixel with the third minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_4: 4 - Clips the pixel with the fourth minimum and maximum of the 8 neighbour pixels. This is equivalent to a median filter
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_5: 5 - Line-sensitive clipping giving the minimal change
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_7: 9 - Line-sensitive clipping on a line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_8: 10 - Replaces the target pixel with the closest neighbour
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_10: 13 - Bob mode, interpolates top field from the line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_11: 14 - Bob mode, interpolates bottom field from the line where the neighbours pixels are the closest
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_12: 15 - Bob mode, interpolates top field. Same as 13 but with a more complicated interpolation formula
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_13: 16 - Bob mode, interpolates bottom field. Same as 14 but with a more complicated interpolation formula
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_14: 17 - Clips the pixel with the minimum and maximum of respectively the maximum and minimum of each pair of opposite neighbour pixels
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_15: 18 - Line-sensitive clipping using opposite neighbours whose greatest distance from the current pixel is minimal
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_16: 19 - Replaces the pixel with the average of its 8 neighbours
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_17: 20 - Averages the 9 pixels ([1 1 1] horizontal and vertical blur)
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_18: 21 - Clips pixels using the averages of opposite neighbour
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_19: 22 - Same as mode 21 but simpler and faster
translations.filter.removegrain.standard.m0._item_20: 23 - Small edge and halo removal, but reputed useless

translations.filter.pad.standard.width._description: Establece el ancho de la zona del relleno
translations.filter.pad.standard.height._description: Establece la altura de la zona del relleno

translations.filter.pad.advanced.color._description: Establece el color del borde de la zona del relleno
translations.filter.pad.advanced.aspect._description: Añade un relleno en función de una relación de aspecto, no de una resolución
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_msize_x._de: Set the luma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_msize_y._de: Set the luma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.luma_amount._des: Set the luma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_msize_x._: Set the chroma matrix horizontal size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_msize_y._: Set the chroma matrix vertical size. It must be an odd integer between 3 and 23.
translations.filter.unsharp.standard.chroma_amount._d: Set the chroma effect strength. It must be a floating point number, reasonable values lay between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of zero will disable the effect.
translations.filter.tmix.standard.frames._description: The number of frames to mix into each other.
translations.filter.yadif.standard.parity._descriptio: Specify the assumed picture field parity.
translations.filter.zscale.standard.width._descriptio: El ancho del vídeo de salida
translations.filter.zscale.standard.height._descripti: La altura del vídeo de salida
